title: Tangled Truths
description: My enemy is the Apocalypse.Anonymous. Faceless.Shrouded in cloaks and deception.They are the true puppeteers of East Point, pulling the strings of their minions and controlling the masses of sheep. They're cowards hiding behind false identities and blank addresses.And guess who’s still their number one plaything? Yep, that’s me.When I came to East Point, I had one mission in mind: find the people responsible for killing my best friend. And boy, did I get more than I bargained for. Everything I’ve looked into twists and turns to dead-ends.No one is who they say they are.When identities are revealed, we're more screwed than before. With every step we take forward, we're thrust a million steps back.But this time, I’m not alone. I have my four guys by my side. Together, with shreds of new evidence and better technology, we will continue our investigation into Magnolia’s murder. And bring justice to her death.Or die trying.*Tangled Truths is book 2 of 3 books.* Tangled Truths is a full-length, 150,000 word, mature/dark/ contemporary/new adult/ bully romance. Full of mystery, spicy scenes, and foul language. Recommended for 18+ readers. TT is a reverse harem novel, meaning the FMC has more than one love interest and does NOT have to choose. FMMMM* This book will end in a cliffhanger and cannot be read as a standalone* Please always make sure to read the author's note at the beginning of the book.
author: Aly Beck
